review: The Chromecast was super easy to set up, and it does everything we want to do for a cheap price. As I read other reviews, the primary complaint was that the Chromecast doesn't have as many available apps as other devices. We are not big TV watchers, so we primarily use it for Netflix and for casting a tab from Chrome Browser. For that purpose, it is perfect and the price is great.
author: Robbie Overton
